title: Top 10 most anticipated drug launches of 2023
author: Ben Adams; Zoey Becker; Kevin Dunleavy
description: For the third year in a row, Evaluate Vantage's most hotly tipped drug approval when it comes to future sales potential is an Alzheimer's disease therapy, but there is far more caution in this year's list than we have seen before. | For the third year in a row, Evaluate Vantage's most hotly tipped drug approval when it comes to future sales potential is an Alzheimer's therapy, but there is far more caution in this year's list than we have seen before.
